channel.title: Linux ubuntu?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?! please help any admins or any usefull people
channel.description:
ok, my laptop is on linux, ubuntu. im trying to download a source, but when i do it comes up as read me's the moparscape official one has a linux option, but the other's dont, is there anyway that i can get these servers to run on my linux operating system?
please help guys
thanks for your time
